job.title: Geospatial Information Scientist and Technologist
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer & Network Security
job.description:
Excelity is seeking a Geospatial Information Scientist and Technologist for a project responsible for building the next generation Mission Information Systems for an exciting Government customer with a very critical mission. The candidate will work with the engineering team and customer to ensure successful development of high profile, complex, technical deliverables that are core to the continued success of our award-winning projects.
The Geospatial Information Scientist and Technologist will have experience managing the Performing geographic information systems (GIS) analyses on natural resources data and strong knowledge and understanding of global positioning systems (GPS). Geospatial Information Scientist and Technologist will plan, design, and develop complex documents, and analyze spatial and relational databases. Geospatial Information Scientist and Technologist will build complex databases by capturing map information with a coordinate digitizer, produce computer map products depicting contents of databases, and write complex software routines to facilitate analysis.
